definitions.definition: to prepare a machine so it will operate or stop later:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] I'll preset the oven to come on at 5 p.m.

definitions.definition: to arrange for or agree to something:
examples: The agenda for the meeting has been preset.
We have a device which switches the lights on at a preset time in the evening.

definitions.definition: relating to part of a machine that is used to prepare it to operate or stop later:
examples: Press and hold the numeric preset button.
